'''''Mythlore'' 8''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol2/iss4/ Volume 2, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

== Contents ==

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial: "Tolkien at Eighty: An Appreciation." 3.
* GoodKnight, Glen. The Counsel of Elrond. 9.
* Zuber, Bernie. Across the Brandywine. 10+.
* Missives to Mythlore. 27.

====Articles====

* Marmor, Paula. "The Wielders of the Three: And Other Trees." 5-8.
* Bond, Brian C. "The Unity of Word: Language in C.S. Lewis' Trilogy." 13-15.
* Christopher, Joe R. "An Introduction to Narnia, Part 3: The Genre of the Chronicles." 17-20.
* Hannay, Margaret P. "C.S. Lewis Collection at Wheaton College." 20.

====Fiction & Poetry====

* Williams, Charles. "The Noises That Weren't There. Third and Final Chapter of the Unfinished Manuscript." 21-25.
* Robin, Doris. Monolog of a Certain Hobbit. 12.
